email_templates.name: Technical Drawings Ready
email_templates.subject: SPW600e Technical Drawings - {{request_id}} - Ready for Download
email_templates.description: Sent when technical drawings have been generated and are ready for download. Includes links to all drawing files and expiry information.

email_templates.name: Specification Document Ready
email_templates.subject: SPW600e Technical Specification - {{spec_id}} - {{project_name}}
email_templates.description: Sent when a technical specification document has been generated. Includes thermal performance data, material specifications, and compliance information.

email_templates.name: Quote Technical Package Ready
email_templates.subject: Quote {{quote_id}} - Technical Package Ready for Pricing
email_templates.description: Sent to sales team when technical data for a quote is ready. Includes bill of materials, drawings, and estimated weights for pricing.

email_templates.name: Validation Error Notification
email_templates.subject: SPW600e Specification Validation Failed - {{request_id}}
email_templates.description: Sent when door specifications fail validation. Lists all validation errors with suggested corrections.

email_templates.name: Manufacturing Package Ready
email_templates.subject: Manufacturing Order {{order_id}} - Production Drawings Ready
email_templates.description: Sent to manufacturing team when production drawings and material specifications are ready for a confirmed order.

internal_notifications.trigger: When new drawing request is received or drawings are generated
